# Code of Conduct

As contributors and maintainers of **TemporalVoiceSDK**, we pledge to create a respectful, welcoming, and inclusive environment.

- Be respectful and constructive.
- Avoid harassment or offensive behavior.
- Respect differing viewpoints.

Violations may result in removal from the community. If you observe unacceptable behavior, please report it to `support@temporalaitechnologies.com`.
